name: Sales
description: Responsible for selling products or services and managing client relationships.

name: Marketing
description: Focuses on promoting and advertising products or services to attract and retain customers.

name: Finance
description: Manages financial resources, budgeting, and financial planning for the organization.

name: Human Resources
description: Deals with employee recruitment, training, benefits, and overall personnel management.

name: IT
description: Handles technology infrastructure, software development, and IT support for the organization.

name: Operations
description: Manages day-to-day business operations, ensuring efficiency and smooth workflows.

name: Customer Service
description: Provides assistance and support to customers, addressing inquiries and resolving issues.

name: Research and Development
description: Focuses on creating and improving products, services, and processes through research and innovation.

name: Legal
description: Deals with legal matters, compliance, contracts, and ensures the organization operates within the law.

name: Administration
description: Handles administrative tasks, office management, and coordination of various functions within the organization.
